briefdescription.para: Total number of bits used for AoI flags and manual AoI subsystems.
Number of bits for manual AoI subsystems.
Indicating the entity added manually to the AoI.
Indicating the entity added automatically by the trigger to the AoI.

detaileddescription.para: A special subsystem index that sets no bits (due to overflow). Used internally when EntityCache is offloaded.
This typedef dictates the size of the set of AoI subsystems that control Entity's AoI list. One bit is reserved for AoI triggers the remaining are to be used by game scripts for manual AoI.

briefdescription.para: Waiting to send enterAoI to client.
Waiting to send createEntity to client.
Waiting to be removed and re-added to the AoI.
Should be sent in the next Witness::update()

detaileddescription.para: Indicating whether or not volatile position updates are detailed at all distances.
If any of these are set, we shouldn't do a normal update in RealEntityWithWitnesses::update. (Actually, REQUEST_PENDING should never be set on something in the queue).
This contructor is only used in EntityCacheMap::find and EntityCacheMap::add
Reset client related state.
This could be called either when this EntityCache is constructed or when it is removed from the client.
Called when the entity is removed from client. Reset client related state but retain server related ones.
This method updates the priority associated with this cache.
This method calculates the LoD priority.
This method is used to update the detail level associated with this cache. If the detail is increased, the necessary information is added to the input bundle that will be sent to the viewing client.

simplesect.para: True if we added data to the bundle, False otherwise.

detaileddescription.para: This method adds the properties that have changed in the outer detail level to the input stream.
This method writes a message to the given bundle indicating which entity the following history events are destined for.

parameterdescription.para: The bundle to put the information on.

detaileddescription.para: This method adds a leaveAoI message to the input bundle.
This method is safe to call on a dummy cache

parameterdescription.para: The bundle to add the message to.
The ID of pEntity(), or if pEntity() is NULL, the ID of the entity this cache referred to

detaileddescription.para: This method is called if an entity is reintroduced to an AoI before it has had a chance to be removed.
This method returns the number of LoD levels associated with this cache.
This method returns the priority associated with the entity.
This method sets the priority associated with the entity.
This method sets the number of the last event that was considered when the associated entity was updated.
This method returns the number of the last event that was considered when the associated entity was updated.
This method sets the volatile number associated with the last update.
This method sets the volatile number associated with the last update.
This method sets the current detail level this cache is at.
This method sets the current detail level this cache is at.
This method returns the id alias that is used for this entity.
This method sets the id alias that is used for this entity.
This method returns whether or not volatile position updates are detailed at all distances.
This method sets whether or not volatile position updates are detailed at all distances.
This method sets the event numbers associated with some cache levels. The input is an array of 'size' event numbers. These are used to set the top 'size' cache event numbers.

This method adds the entity to the specified AoI subsystem.
idx
AoI subsystem index.

This method removes the entity from the specified AoI subsystem.
idx
AoI subsystem index.

This method checks if the entity is in the specified AoI subsystem.
idx
AoI subsystem index.
Static method to return number of lod levels for an entity
This method is used to stamp a cache level with the last event number that sent from it.
This method is used get the event number a cache level was last stamped with.
This method calculates the distance to origin.
This method adds the new property values of the current detail level to the input stream.

parameterdescription.para: The stream to add the changes to.
If not NULL, a message is started on this bundle if any properties are added.
If true, before a new message is started on the

simplesect.para: True if we added any property values, false if there were no new property values at this level of detail.

detaileddescription.para: Streaming operator for EntityCache.
Streaming operator for EntityCache.
This class is used by RealEntityWithWitnesses to cache information about other entities.
